title: Yu☆Gi☆Oh! Arc-V (Yu-Gi-Oh! Arc-V)
synopsis: Action Duels, which allow duelists to soar and swing alongside their Duel Monsters, are taking the world by storm. Due to an evolutionary breakthrough, the "Solid Vision" system is now able to provide Duel Monsters with mass.
